scripts.build-studio: lerna bootstrap && (cd packages/studio && (sanity graphql deploy --no-playground && sanity build))
scripts.build-web: lerna bootstrap && (cd studio && npm run graphql-deploy) && (cd.. && cd web && npm run build)
scripts.dev-web: lerna bootstrap && (cd studio && npm run graphql-deploy) && (cd.. && cd web && npm run develop)
